div.p: Acylphosphatase from Drosophila melanogaster (AcPDro2) have been crystallized in presence of different substrates. Dataset were collected on the complexes AcPDro2:glycerol, AcPDro2:Ethylene glycole, AcPDro2:pNPP, AcPDro2:AMP-PNP. Diffraction data were collected in the P3121 space group with unit cell constants a=b=46Å, c=99Å and maximum resolution varying from 1.6 to 1.8 Å.
As backup project we characterized an acylphosphatase from Sulfolobus s. Crystal were not single, diffraction data were obtained up to a maximum resolution of 2.0Å.
